'''''Les Quatre Coups''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must complete {{Quest|Villains}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is likely a reference to the 1959 French film ''{{w|The 400 Blows}}'' (''Les quatre cents coups'').
